definition: pad/cushion/mat/to pad out/to fill a gap/to pay for sb/to advance (money)

sentences.english: You have something on your mind, I think, " said the mattress".
sentences.chinese: “你脑子里在想些什么，我觉得，”床垫慵圈地说。

sentences.english: Mailijian Mattress advances for the present ages, and benefits for future.
sentences.chinese: “美力坚”床垫利在当代，功在千秋。

sentences.english: After dinner, the table is cleared and moved outside and mattresses laid down.
sentences.chinese: 晚餐后矮桌清理干净并移到外面，地上铺上了床垫。

sentences.english: There is no such thing as a permanent advertising succe .
sentences.chinese: 广告没有椰棕床垫怎么样永恒的成功。

sentences.english: Sears sometimes has a good mattress sale.
sentences.chinese: Sears有时候的床垫卖的很好。

sentences.english: Saggy 7 mattress causes discomfort 8 and reduces our sleep quality.
sentences.chinese: 松垮的床垫会让你感到不舒服，降低我们的睡眠质量。

sentences.english: A fetid odor seeps from the walls, the odor of a mildewed mattress.
sentences.chinese: 墙里渗出一股恶臭味，那是发霉的床垫味。

sentences.english: As for spring mattresses, we counteroffer (at) US$610 each.
sentences.chinese: 至于弹簧床垫，我们还盘每个610美元。

sentences.english: This Machine is used for Foam Blocks & Foam Matress Compressing, Sealing then Packing into small Capacity.
sentences.chinese: 本机主要用于泡绵体和泡绵床垫的压缩封边打包工作。

sentences.english: It is immoral that a mattress should have so much power.
sentences.chinese: 这很不象话，一个床垫有这么大的威力。

sentences.english: Strange BedfellowsSurvivors carry salvaged mattresses near earthquake-ravaged Beichuan County in China's Sichuan province.
sentences.chinese: 地震的幸存者扛着救灾床垫走在北川县城外。

sentences.english: Spend time shopping for the right mattress and pillow, and adjust your thermostat to the best temperature for you.
sentences.chinese: 购买合适的床垫和枕头，将恒温器调到最适合的温度。

sentences.english: Find out if a foam mattress or coil spring makes any difference.
sentences.chinese: 找出是否泡沫床垫或螺旋弹簧作出任何区别。

sentences.english: The chamber dimensions are adapted to reprocess standard-size mattresses.
sentences.chinese: 蒸汽消毒器内空间适合再加工处理标准大小床垫。

sentences.english: We must place a mattress there.
sentences.chinese: 在缺口处得放一块床垫。

sentences.english: Because of this piece of good mattess, be you protection is vertebral the urgentest need.
sentences.chinese: 因此一张好的床垫，正是您保护脊椎最迫切的需要。

definition: spring mattress (loanword from "Simmons" bedding company name)
summer sleeping mat (e.g. of woven split bamboo)/CL:張|张[zhang1],領|领[ling3]
